text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityClass
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    PSNpersonA living subject of the species homo sapiens.
  • Import all the codes that are contained in EntityClassOrganization

name: XEntityClassPersonOrOrgReceiving
title: x_EntityClassPersonOrOrgReceiving
